title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects in the Navigator, the option to open or close a project is not always available.
EB: The option to open or close a project should always be available when multiple projects are selected in the Navigator.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2 in the Navigator.
3. Attempt to close the project.
4. Select both P1 and P2 projects.
5. Observe if the option to open or close a project is available.
